name: Streamlink Twitch
description: Easily open Twitch streams with Streamlink

preferences.name: Player
preferences.description: Video Player to use. | Default: mpv

preferences.name: Favorite Streamers
preferences.description: Comma seperated list of streamers to match against so you can type even less! | Default:

preferences.name: Disable Notifications
preferences.description: Turn off feedback notifications when launching streams | Default: No

preferences.name: Skip preroll ads
preferences.description: Attempt to skip preroll ads. This really just means you won't see video for about 30 seconds. | Default: No

preferences.name: Streamlink Path
preferences.description: Path to streamlink binary if it's not in your $PATH | Default:

preferences.name: Restrict CPU Cores
preferences.description: Limit Streamlink to a single CPU Core (13th and 14th Gen Intel 'Fix') | Default: No
